name: Robo X
description:
Join RoboX as he collects the data clusters to restore the energy back to RoBo City.
RoBo City is out of energy and the robots are losing their mind. Take the challenge and solve the puzzles to restore the energy and save RoBo City.

*Note: RoboX 2 is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available.

Features:
- Enjoy the story and live the robots life.
- Addictive puzzles just for you.
- High quality graphics.
- Unique levels to play.
- Play RoboX the way you want with more than 20 amazing skins.


Important message for parents:
This game contains
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- The option to make in-app purchases.
